technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Right kidney demonstrates mildly heterogeneous, no hydronephrosis.
Urinary bladder is mildly heterogeneous, no intraluminal lesions.
Placenta is hyperechoic and normally located.
Breast tissue shows coarse lesion measuring 37.19 mm.
Thyroid gland shows isoechoic echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
